tasks.title: Compress Large Images to WebP Format
tasks.description: Compress specified large images using Sharp to meet size targets and convert to WebP for better performance.
tasks.details: Install sharp: `pnpm add sharp`. Use Node script: import sharp from 'sharp'; sharp('path/to/export-chatgpt-conversation-markdown-html.png').resize({width:1200,height:800,fit:'inside'}).webp({quality:80}).toFile('apps/web/public/images/tools/chatgpt-conversation-exporter/export-chatgpt-conversation-markdown-html.webp', () => {}); Repeat for hnes-screenshot.png (target <150KB, resize to 800x600), avatar.png (<100KB, resize to 300x300). Replace original files with .webp versions and update img src in code to use new files with srcset for fallback.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify file sizes < targets using ls -lh. Test page load with Lighthouse (aim for >90 Performance). Check images display correctly across browsers using WebP support detection.

tasks.title: Add Metadata to Tool Pages
tasks.description: Implement dynamic metadata exports for specified tool pages using Next.js generateMetadata.
tasks.details: In apps/web/app/(home)/tools/page.tsx: export const metadata = {title: 'Tools', description: 'Discover powerful tools for productivity and development at testy.cool'}; For hnes/page.tsx: title: 'HNES - Hacker News Export Service', description: '...'; For chatgpt-conversation-exporter/page.tsx: title: 'ChatGPT Conversation Exporter', description: '...'. Use Next.js 14+ App Router metadata API. Ensure openGraph and twitter metadata included.
tasks.testStrategy: View page source to verify <title> and <meta name="description"> present. Use Google Rich Results Test and Twitter Card Validator. Check SEO tools like Screaming Frog.

tasks.title: Update Sitemap Configuration
tasks.description: Fix next-sitemap.config.cjs to include all tool pages, blog posts, and privacy page.
tasks.details: Update next-sitemap.config.cjs: module.exports = { siteUrl: 'https://testy.cool', generateRobotsTxt: true, additionalPaths: async (config) => [ { loc: '/tools/hnes', changefreq: 'monthly', priority: 0.7 }, { loc: '/tools/chatgpt-conversation-exporter', changefreq: 'monthly', priority: 0.7 }, { loc: '/privacy', priority: 0.6 }, { loc: '/blog/tutorial/claude-code-ssh-setup', changefreq: 'yearly', priority: 0.8 } ], exclude: ['/admin/*'] }; Run `pnpm next-sitemap` to generate.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify sitemap.xml at /sitemap.xml contains all paths using browser inspection. Submit to Google Search Console and check indexing status.

tasks.title: Implement Dynamic Canonical URLs
tasks.description: Update apps/web/lib/metadata.ts to generate page-specific canonical URLs.
tasks.details: Modify metadata.ts: export function getCanonicalUrl(pathname: string): string { return `https://testy.cool${pathname}`; }; In page metadata: <link rel="canonical" href={getCanonicalUrl(router.asPath)} />; Use Next.js Head or metadata API: canonical: `https://testy.cool${pathname}`. Ensure no hardcoded '/' values remain.
tasks.testStrategy: Inspect page source for <link rel="canonical" href="https://testy.cool/tools/hnes" /> on each page. Use SEO tools to verify canonicals match current URLs.

tasks.title: Remove Unused Dependencies
tasks.description: Clean package.json by removing unused packages and reinstall dependencies.
tasks.details: Edit apps/web/package.json, remove "katex", "rehype-katex", "mermaid" if unused. Run `pnpm install` to update lockfile. Verify no import errors: `pnpm build`. Check bundle size reduction with `pnpm build --stats`.
tasks.testStrategy: Run `pnpm build` and `pnpm start` successfully. Verify no console errors mentioning removed packages. Check bundle size reduced via webpack-bundle-analyzer.

tasks.title: Implement JSON-LD Structured Data
tasks.description: Add Organization schema to homepage, BlogPosting to blog posts, BreadcrumbList site-wide.
tasks.details: Create lib/jsonld.ts: export function OrganizationSchema() { return { "@context": "https://schema.org", "@type": "Organization", "name": "testy.cool", "url": "https://testy.cool" }; }; For BlogPosting in blog pages: { "@type": "BlogPosting", "headline": post.title, "datePublished": post.date }; BreadcrumbList: [{"@type":"ListItem","position":1,"name":"Home","item":"https://testy.cool"},...]; Add to <Head> or use next/script: <script type="application/ld+json" dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{__html: JSON.stringify(schema)}} />.
tasks.testStrategy: Use Google's Rich Results Test on affected pages. Verify structured data appears in page source. Check Search Console Enhancements report.

tasks.title: Fix Image Alt Text Issues
tasks.description: Update alt texts in og-image.tsx and blog MDX files for better accessibility and SEO.
tasks.details: In apps/web/components/og-image.tsx: replace alt="scrapedrive.com" with alt="testy.cool logo"; In apps/web/content/blog/tutorial/setup-blog-with-testy-blog.mdx: change alt="Homepage" to alt="testy.cool homepage showing blog posts list"; alt="Post" to alt="Sample blog post preview on testy.cool". Use descriptive, keyword-relevant alt text.
tasks.testStrategy: Run axe DevTools or Lighthouse Accessibility audit (aim for 100%). Manually inspect img elements in browser dev tools. Verify alt texts appear in Google Image search.

tasks.title: Expand Thin Blog Content
tasks.description: Expand specified thin content posts to 400+ words with valuable additions.
tasks.details: For windows-nul-file.mdx: Add sections on Linux equivalents (/dev/null), programming usage (Python os.devnull), troubleshooting steps, related Windows quirks, code examples. Target 450 words. For setup-blog-with-testy-blog.mdx: Add deployment guides, custom domain setup, theme customization, performance tips, migration from other platforms. Target 600 words. Maintain MDX format and SEO structure.
tasks.testStrategy: Count words using wordcounter.net (>400 each). Check readability scores (Flesch >60). Verify content adds value via internal review. Monitor GSC performance post-publish.
